guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong against grouped champions;

### 2. CONS

- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Heavily Gnar dependent composition;
- Less efficient in damage and crowd control against spread out enemies;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=dragon]][[trait=wild]]

[[item=rapid-firecannon]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=lucian]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=graves]] → [[champion=poppy]]
 
[[champion=lucian]] → [[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=gnar]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]
[[champion=karthus]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=aurelion-sol]] [[champion=karthus]] → [[champion=ahri]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS
[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]] → [[champion=kennen]] [[champion=poppy]] [[champion=gnar]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Forte dano em área;
- Forte controle de multidão;
- Forte contra inimigos agrupados;

### 2. CONTRAS

- Necessita de troca de campeões ao longo da partida;
- Composição fortemente dependente de Gnar;
- Eficiência de controle e de dano reduzidos contra campeões espalhados;

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=dragon]][[trait=wild]]

[[item=rapid-firecannon]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=tristana]]
[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=lucian]]


#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=graves]] → [[champion=poppy]]
 
[[champion=lucian]] → [[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=kennen]]

[[champion=gnar]]


#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]
[[champion=karthus]]


### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS
 
[[champion=aurelion-sol]] [[champion=karthus]] → [[champion=ahri]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS
[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]] → [[champion=kennen]] [[champion=poppy]] [[champion=gnar]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Extra survivability thanks to Kindred’s ability;
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against grouped champions;

### 2. CONS

- Composition is very dependent on Kindred;
- Champions of medium to high cost (median cost: 3)
- Less efficient in damage and crowd control against spread out enemies;

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=mordekaiser]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=braum]]



#### Mid Game:

[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]

 [[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=sejuani]]

[[champion=fiora]]→ [[champion=volibear]]

#### Late Game:

[[champion=anivia]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS
 
[[champion=anivia]]→ [[champion=braum]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

 [[item=frozen-mallet]] → [[champion=kayle]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→ [[champion=ashe]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Forte controle de campo;
- Sobrevivência extra graças à habilidade de Kindred;
- Neutralização de um campeão no início do turno (bônus de fantasma);
- Forte contra inimigos agrupados.

### 2. CONTRAS

- Altamente dependente de Kindred;
- Campeões de custo médio para alto (custo mediano: 3);
- Eficiência de controle e de dano reduzidos contra campeões espalhados.

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]


[[item=hush]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]


### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=mordekaiser]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=braum]]

#### Meio do Jogo:


[[champion=ashe]]

[[champion=kindred]]

 [[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=sejuani]]

[[champion=fiora]]→ [[champion=volibear]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=anivia]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=anivia]]→ [[champion=braum]] [[champion=kayle]]

### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=frozen-mallet]] → [[champion=kayle]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]

[[item=runaans-hurricane]]→ [[champion=ashe]] [[champion=vayne]][[champion=varus]] [[champion=kindred]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Heavy openning damage;
- Strong against spread out enemies;
- Medium cost champions ( average cost ~ 2,5);

### 2. CONS

- Highly dependent of Akali; 
- Low defensive power champions;
- Low damage and survival against grouped champions or that are equipped with [[item=phantom-dancer]].


### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=knight]] [[trait=glacial]] [[trait=yordle]]

[[item=phantom-dancer]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=pyke]]
[[champion=shen]]
[[champion=zed]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=kassadin]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=reksai]] → [[champion=akali]]

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=kennen]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=evelynn]]
[[champion=rengar]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=evelynn]][[champion=rengar]] → [[champion=katarina]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]→ [[champion=kennen]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Dano de abertura forte;
- Forte contra inimigos separados;
- Campeões de custo médio (custo mediano $2,5).

### 2. CONTRAS

-  Altamente dependente de Akali;
- Campeões com baixo poder defensivo;
- Eficiência de dano e de sobrevivência reduzidos contra campeãos agrupados ou equipados com [[item=phantom-dancer]].


### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=knight]] [[trait=glacial]] [[trait=yordle]]

[[item=phantom-dancer]]
[[item=frozen-heart]]


### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=pyke]]
[[champion=shen]]
[[champion=zed]];
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=kassadin]]

#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=reksai]] → [[champion=akali]]

[[champion=kassadin]]→[[champion=kennen]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=evelynn]]
[[champion=rengar]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=evelynn]][[champion=rengar]] → [[champion=katarina]]

### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=youmuus-ghostblade]]→ [[champion=kennen]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong area damage;
- Mana control of the opponents;
- Neutralize various types of champions that depend on mana to transform and/or crowd control;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS

- Need to swap champions during the match;
- High cost champions ( median cost: 3.5 coins);
- Area damage and control efficiency reduced against spread out enemies.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=yordle]] [[trait=demon]]

[[trait=assassin]][[trait=ninja]]

[[item=hush]] 
[[item=sword-breaker]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=nidalee]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=shyvana]]
[[champion=morgana]]
[[champion=aatrox]]
[[champion=evelynn]]

#### Late Game:
[[champion=shyvana]]→ [[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→ [[champion=swain]]

[[champion=evelynn]]→[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=draven]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=brand]]→[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=nidalee]]+[[item=darkin]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=shyvana]]+[[item=darkin]]
 
### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=darkin]]

[[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]]→[[champion=varus]] [[champion=gnar]] [[champion=swain]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Forte dano em área;
- Controle de mana dos adversários;
- Neutralização de diversos tipos de campeões dependentes de mana para se transformar ou para controle em área;
- Forte contra inimigos agrupados.

### 2. CONTRAS

- Necessita de substituições de campeões no tabuleiro ao longo da partida;
- Campeões de custo alto (custo mediano: $3,5);
- Eficiência de dano em área e de controle reduzidos contra campeões espalhados.

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=yordle]] [[trait=demon]]

[[trait=assassin]][[trait=ninja]]


[[item=hush]] 
[[item=sword-breaker]]

### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=elise]]
[[champion=varus]]
[[champion=nidalee]]


#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=shyvana]]
[[champion=morgana]]
[[champion=aatrox]]
[[champion=evelynn]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=shyvana]]→ [[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=nidalee]]→ [[champion=swain]]

[[champion=evelynn]]→[[champion=brand]]

[[champion=draven]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=brand]]→[[champion=evelynn]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=nidalee]]+[[item=darkin]]

[[champion=swain]] →[[champion=shyvana]]+[[item=darkin]]


### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=darkin]]

[[item=blade-of-the-ruined-king]]→[[champion=varus]] [[champion=gnar]] [[champion=swain]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong survivability;
- Champions of medium cost (median cost: 2.5 coins);
- Minor need in changing champions’s positions;

### 2. CONS

- Heavily dependent on Kayle to get the full Noble bonus;
- Heavily dependent on items;
- Needs 2x [[item=spatula]] to make 2x[[item=runaans-hurricane]] for Jinx;
- Difficult to achieve full efficiency (lack of alternative champions to complete the Nobles’ bonus)

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=hextech]] [[trait=demon]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=sword-breaker]]


### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=tristana]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=varus]]

[[champion=lucian]]

[[champion=vi]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=leona]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=kayle]]

### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=vi]]→ [[champion=jayce]]

### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=red-buff]] [[item=cursed-blade]] [[item=sword-breaker]] → [[champion=jinx]] [[champion=lucian]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Forte sobrevivência;
- Campeões de custo médio (custo mediano $2,5);
- Baixa necessidade de mudança no posicionamento;

### 2. CONTRAS

- Fortemente dependente de Kayle;
- Fortemente dependente de itens.
- Necessita, no mínimo, de 2x [[item=spatula]] para fazer 2x [[item=runaans-hurricane]] de Jinx;
- Composição difícil de se obter eficiência completa (falta de campeões alternativos para completar o bônus de Nobres);

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=hextech]] [[trait=demon]]


[[item=hush]]
[[item=sword-breaker]]

### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=garen]]
[[champion=fiora]]
[[champion=vayne]]
[[champion=graves]]
[[champion=tristana]]


#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=varus]]

[[champion=lucian]]

[[champion=vi]]

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=jinx]]

[[champion=graves]]→[[champion=leona]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=kayle]]


### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=vi]]→ [[champion=jayce]]

### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=red-buff]] [[item=cursed-blade]] [[item=sword-breaker]] → [[champion=jinx]] [[champion=lucian]]

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong survivability; 
- Curses an enemy champion at the beginning of the turn (Phantom’s bonus);
- Strong against magic damage compositions.

### 2. CONS

- High cost champions ( average cost ~ 4);
- Dependent on two Tier 5 Champions (Karthus and Pantheon);
- Relatively low damage if you don't have Aurelian Sol with the right items and if you don't have the sorcerer’s bonus.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]

### 4. GAME

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=braum]]
[[champion=mordekaiser]]

#### Mid Game:

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=khazix]]→ [[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=leona]]

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]→ [[champion=karthus]]

[[champion=pantheon]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

 [[champion=chogath]][[champion=reksai]]→[[champion=khazix]] 

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]] 

[[champion=karthus]]→[[champion=mordekaiser]] 


### 6. USEFUL ITEMS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=chogath]] [[champion=reksai]] [[champion=pantheon]]
guide.pt_br:
### 1. PRÓS 

- Forte controle de multidão;
- Forte sobrevivência;
- Amaldiçoa um campeão inimigo no início do turno (bônus de Fantasma);
- Forte contra times focados em dano mágico.

### 2. CONTRAS

- Campeões de custo alto (custo mediano $4);
- Dependente de dois campeões de Nível 5 (Karthus e Pantheon).
- Dano relativamente baixo se não possuir Aurelian Sol com os itens certos e se não possuir o bônus de feiticeiros.

### 3. FRAQUEZA

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=assassin]]

[[item=hush]]
[[item=dragons-claw]]


### 4. PARTIDA

#### Início do Jogo: 

[[champion=kassadin]]
[[champion=khazix]]
[[champion=reksai]]
[[champion=braum]]
[[champion=mordekaiser]]

#### Meio do Jogo:

[[champion=kindred]]

[[champion=khazix]]→ [[champion=chogath]]

[[champion=braum]]→ [[champion=leona]]

[[champion=aurelion-sol]]

#### Fim do Jogo:

[[champion=mordekaiser]]→ [[champion=karthus]]

[[champion=pantheon]]

### 5. CAMPEÕES ALTERNATIVOS

[[champion=chogath]][[champion=reksai]]→[[champion=khazix]] 

[[champion=leona]]→[[champion=braum]] 

[[champion=karthus]]→[[champion=mordekaiser]] 


### 6. ITENS ÚTEIS

[[item=force-of-nature]]

[[item=yuumi]]→[[champion=chogath]] [[champion=reksai]] [[champion=pantheon]]

### 1. PROS

- Strong burst damage;
- Strong single damage;
- Champions of low cost (median cost: 2.5 coins).

### 2. CONS

- Low defensive power;
- Weak against grouped enemies;
- Damage efficiency reduced against enemies equiped with [[item=phantom-dancer]];
- Dependent of [[item=youmuus-ghostblade]] in Kassadin (to obtain and complete assassins’ bonus).

guide.en_us:
### 1. PROS

- Strong crowd control;
- Strong area damage;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS
- Medium to high cost champions (median cost: 3,5 coins);
- Dependent on several Tier 4 and 5 champions;
- Strongly mana dependent;
- Strongly dependent on magic damage.

### 3. WEAKNESS

[[trait=demon]]
[[trait=glacial]]
[[trait=dragon]]

[[item=hush]]

[[item=dragons-claw]]

#### Early Game: 

[[champion=lulu]]
[[champion=tristana]]

[[champion=ahri]]


#### Mid Game:

[[champion=tristana]]→[[champion=poppy]]

[[champion=kennen]]→[[champion=gnar]]

[[champion=shyvana]]

[[champion=sejuani]]


#### Late Game:

[[champion=veigar]]→[[champion=aurelion-sol]]

[[champion=swain]]


### 5. ALTERNATIVE CHAMPIONS

[[champion=ahri]]→[[champion=veigar]]

[[champion=swain]]→[[champion=elise]]

### 1. PROS
- Strong crowd control;
- Strong area damage;
- Strong survivability;
- Strong against grouped enemies.

### 2. CONS

- Strongly mana’s dependent;
- Need to swap champions during the match;
- Dependent on two Tier 5 champions (Pantheon and Swain).
